description: Maxis and Electronic Arts developed and released Spore in 2008. The game is a strategic simulation where players evolve their creatures through multiple stages of life.

Additionally, Galactic Adventures is an expansion pack Maxis and Electronic Arts released in 2009 that adds features to Spore (requires Spore to run). Spore Galactic Adventures gamers then install SPOREMOD files to alter elements in the expansion pack.
